lore: The Egg-Front was never better protected than by the Romulette Order. From a young age, they're trained in the ancient art of the stone omeletteâ€”a cooking style that lets them create a tough shield out ofâ€¦ well, other eggs that didn't have the best of fates. Plus, they look pretty awesome in their helmets.
menagerieDialog: (They're nestled together, occasionally emitting soft peeping sounds.)
We may look fragile, but we'll crack some skulls!
Don't let our appearance fool you. We've got a few tricks up our... well, you know.
Our shells are tougher than they look. Bring it on!
(They're rolling around erratically, narrowly avoiding collisions.)
name: Romulette
